home.title: Hello I'm Kevin Naranjo
home.subtitle: Mechatronics Engineer and Development Leader
home.description: Over 4 years of experience in software development and artificial intelligence, creating innovative technological solutions that make a positive impact.
home.aboutDescription1: This achievement taught me that with effort and dedication I can not only transform my life, but also the lives of those around me. I enjoy continuously learning and applying my knowledge to make people's lives easier, developing technological solutions that impact various areas.
home.aboutDescription2: My favorite activities include programming, exercising, and traveling. I find inspiration at the gym and in my explorations, where I reflect on how technology can be integrated to improve our daily experiences.
home.skillsSubtitle: Technologies and areas of specialization that allow me to create innovative solutions.
home.softwareDesc: Expert in designing and building robust applications with modern technologies.
home.mlDesc: Development of predictive models and advanced analytics to optimize processes.
home.cvDesc: Implementation of visual recognition systems for automation.
home.webDevDesc: Creation of modern web platforms, focused on user experience.
home.contactDesc: Contact me to discuss how I can help you take your ideas and projects to the next level.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Mechatronics Engineer graduated from the Autonomous University of Bucaramanga (UNAB)
about.name: Kevin Alejandro Naranjo Reyes
about.bio1: I am a Mechatronics Engineer graduated from the Autonomous University of Bucaramanga (UNAB) with more than four years of experience leading and developing projects in software, artificial intelligence, and innovative technologies.
about.bio2: I am characterized by my dedication to continuous learning, solving complex problems, and creating impactful technological solutions. I have more than 80 certifications from Platzi, focused on machine learning, web development, and emerging technologies.
about.bio3: This achievement taught me that with effort and dedication I can not only transform my life, but also the lives of those around me. I enjoy continuously learning and applying my knowledge to make people's lives easier, developing technological solutions that impact various areas.
about.bio4: My favorite activities include programming, exercising, and traveling. I find inspiration at the gym and in my explorations, where I reflect on how technology can be integrated to improve our daily experiences.
about.careerSubtitle: A journey through my work experience and the projects I have led.
about.job1Desc: At Xactus, I lead multidisciplinary teams to develop innovative artificial intelligence solutions and functional products tailored to client needs.
about.job2Desc: I designed and developed software for technological projects, including configuration platforms and data visualization. I actively participated in the design, manufacturing, and distribution of products.
about.job3Desc: I developed computer vision solutions for automation and visual data analysis, contributing to high-impact projects at K2 Ingeniería.
about.missionDesc: To be a leader in software development and artificial intelligence solutions, using my knowledge to simplify processes and improve people's quality of life.
about.visionDesc: To be recognized as an expert in artificial intelligence and software development, creating technological solutions that inspire and generate positive changes in the world.
about.valuesDesc: Commitment, effort, innovation, and empathy are the values that drive me to seek excellence in every project and in my daily life.
about.projectsDesc: Explore my portfolio to see how I've applied my skills and knowledge in real projects.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Don't hesitate to contact me to discuss your projects or ideas
contact.formSubtitle: Complete the form and I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! I will contact you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again or contact directly via email.
contact.locationDesc: I am located in Santander, Colombia, but I work with clients from all over the world.
contact.faqDesc: Answers to some common questions about my services.
contact.faq1A: I offer software development services, implementation of artificial intelligence solutions, computer vision, and technological consulting for companies in various sectors.
contact.faq2A: My process begins with an initial meeting to understand your needs, followed by a detailed proposal. Then, I develop the solution with constant communication and iterative deliveries to ensure that the final result meets your expectations.
contact.faq3Q: Do you work with international clients?
contact.faq3A: Yes, I work with clients from all over the world. Communication is primarily done via email, video calls, and project management platforms.
contact.faq4A: My rates vary depending on the complexity and scope of the project. I offer customized budgets after fully understanding your specific needs.

footer.description: Mechatronics Engineer and Development Leader with more than 4 years of experience in software, artificial intelligence, and innovative technologies.
